Title: Oman LNG inks term deals with Shell and OQ Trading totalling around 1.55 mtpa
Description: Oman LNG has signed deals to supply LNG to Shell over 10 years and to Oman's international commodity trading firm, OQ Trading, over four years, totalling 1.55 mtpa of LNG. The deals add to agreements signed since December last year for LNG deliveries beginning in 2025, following the expiration of its existing term supply contracts.
Author: CK
